# Connections | Problem | Solution | |-------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | **The monitor is blank.** | The camera is connected to a TV: Pictures will be displayed on the TV instead of in the camera monitor (üìñ 51). | | **Both the TV and camera monitor are blank.** | **EVF ONLY + SENSOR** is selected for **VIEW MODE SETTING**: Put your eye to the viewfinder or choose a different **VIEW MODE SETTING** option (üìñ 14). | | **No picture or sound on TV.** | - The camera is not properly connected: Connect the camera properly (üìñ 51).
- Input on the television is set to ‚ÄúTV‚Äù: Set input to ‚ÄúHDMI‚Äù (üìñ 51).
- The volume on the TV is too low: Use the controls on the television to adjust the volume (üìñ 51). | | **The computer does not recognize the camera. FUJIFILM X RAW STUDIO or FUJIFILM X Acquire fails to correctly detect the camera.** | Be sure the camera and computer are correctly connected (üìñ 253).
Check the option selected for **CONNECTION MODE** on the camera. Select **USB RAW CONV./BACKUP RESTORE** before connecting the USB cable (üìñ 266). |
